headline: NextEra Energy Partnering With Google, Exxon on Data Center Power
summary: NextEra Energy said Monday that it will partner with Alphabet’s Google Cloud to build new, large data center campuses paired with power generation across the U.S., and is working with Exxon Mobil to develop natural-gas fired power plants that would include carbon capture and storage for large customers.  NextEra and Google are already developing the first three data center campuses and looking to identify more locations.

raw.headline: NextEra Energy Partnering With Google, Exxon on Data Center Power

headline: NextEra working with Exxon to develop gigawatt data center for hyperscaler
summary: NextEra plans to pitch the data center site to a hyperscaler. There is no signed agreement with a customer yet.

headline: MGV: Why I Like Vanguard's Mega-Cap Value ETF Here
